data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Vikran Engineering Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from September 03 2025 the equity shares of Vikran Engineering Ltd (Scrip Code: 544496) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20250902-53 dated September 02 2025.
